cause.description:
This is a group for people trying to make the world a healthier place for humans and animals. there are many cases that are found out each day. every day an approximate number of 30 people in the us die from west nile viris.. we have to try and make this number smaller. Thanks for your help! =]
1. People have the right to go outside knowing that you are somewhat safe.
2. The number of deaths around the world from west nile virus need to be smaller.
cause.mission: prevent people from getting this disease.
cause.name: Prevent West Nile Virus.
